trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mt Clemens
There were no other sightings in Mt Clemens on or around September 12th 2008
Summary: One Bright orange light in sky moves rapidly slows moves again and fades comes back 10 minutes later
divs: Sighting DetailsI wanted to put this on record to see if others saw it too. I do not beleive they could have missed it.
